name: Xap
overview: Released as a game demo in 1993 on Amiga Format 54, this crosshairs shooter you guide the purple sphere-craft around the level, using the crosshairs to shoot multi-directionally. Avoid contact with the other creatures but rescue the fluffies and items and avoid mines. Alien Flux combines totally original gameplay, modern pseudo-3D graphics and unique sound effects to create a fast and furious shoot-em up style arcade game, the aim of which is to rescue Fluffies (the cutest creatures in the universe), from invading forces from the fifth dimension.
